20101216010847.000|20101216010849.500|CCO|PANAMA CITY, FLORIDA, PLANNED 
20101216010849.500|20101216010852.000|CCO|THAT ATTACK FOR SOME TIME.
20101216010852.000|20101216010854.000|CCO|NO ONE WAS HURT.
20101216010854.000|20101216010856.000|CCO|BUT THE ENTIRE ORDEAL WAS CAUGHT

20101216010858.000|20101216010900.000|CCO|WHICH WE WON'T SHOW YOU, BUT THE

20101216010904.000|20101216010906.000|CCO|HERE IS THE SUSPECT, CLAY DUKE, 
20101216010906.000|20101216010908.000|CCO|HE PAINTED A RED "V" ON THE WALL
20101216010908.000|20101216010910.000|CCO|OF THE SCHOOL BOARD MEETING AND 
20101216010910.000|20101216010912.000|CCO|PULLED OUT A PISTOL.
20101216010912.000|20101216010914.500|CCO|HE ORDERED ALL THE WOMEN AND 
20101216010914.500|20101216010917.000|CCO|CHILDREN OUT OF THE ROOM.

20101216010919.500|20101216010922.000|CCO|AND THE FIRING OF HIS WIFE FROM 
20101216010922.000|20101216010924.000|CCO|THE SCHOOL SYSTEM FOR WHICH THE 
20101216010924.000|20101216010926.000|CCO|SUPERINTENDENT TOOK 
20101216010926.000|20101216010928.000|CCO|RESPONSIBILITY HOPING DUKE WOULD
20101216010928.000|20101216010930.000|CCO|RELEASE SOME OF THE OTHERS.
20101216010930.000|20101216010932.000|CCO|ONE OF THE BOARD MEMBERS, GINGER
20101216010932.000|20101216010934.000|CCO|LITTLETON WHO HAD BEEN ALLOWED 
20101216010934.000|20101216010936.000|CCO|TO LEAVE TRIED TO INTERVENE.
20101216010936.000|20101216010938.000|CCO|>> I DON'T THINK ANYTHING WAS
